name: Battle of Hillsbrad
tooltip:
Battle of Hillsbrad

Kill Magistrate Burnside and 5 Hillsbrad Councilmen.  Destroy the Hillsbrad Proclamation.  Steal the Hillsbrad Town Registry.  Report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill afterwards.

Requirements:
- Magistrate Burnside
- Hillsbrad Councilman x 5
- Hillsbrad Proclamation destroyed
- Reinforced Chain Vest
- Hillsbrad Town Registry
